title: Microsoft.Build.dll for .netfx 4.0
body:
Does exist some new version of Microsoft.Build.dll for .netfx 4.0 platform?

Because we have some problems with **15.0** toolset and so on. 

Details here (different problems for each issue):

* https://github.com/3F/MvsSln/issues/1
* https://github.com/3F/MvsSln/issues/5
* https://github.com/3F/MvsSln/issues/2
* https://github.com/3F/MvsSln/issues/4  (probably related)

This **works when using this:**

* https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Build/  (It requires .netfx 4.6+)

And failed by different reasons (see issues above) when version is 4.0 (from GAC, win10)

So, what I miss and where to look updated version? or what to do for net 4.0 projects? :)

Thanks,

nodes.body: There are no new versions of MSBuild being produced for .NET 4.0. Several of the problems described are likely avoided by using [MSBuildLocator](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/msbuild/updating-an-existing-application?view=vs-2019).
